title: Taxing the Rich
dc:creator: Queens Podcast Lab
description: Joe, Neda Magbouleh (University of Toronto) and Bart Bonikowski (Harvard) discuss a viral speech by a Dutch writer at Davos, which argues that talk about the need to raise taxes on the rich.
